Luhut Pimpin Rombongan Eksportir RI Ikut Pameran Dagang di China
01 Nov 2019, 12:15 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Andhika Prasetia/detikcom

Jakarta - Indonesia akan mengikuti pameran perdagangan di China, yaitu China Internasional Import Expo (CIIE) pada 5-10 November 2019, di kota Shanghai. Dalam pameran perdagangan tersebut, ada 172 negara yang turut menjajakan produk-produknya.Kementerian Perdagangan menggaet 17 perusahaan untuk mengikuti pameran dagang ini. Kemudian, ada juga 9 perusahaan yang secara mandiri mendaftarkan diri untuk mejeng di CIIE 2019.Perhelatan dagang internasional ini turut mengundang atase-atase negara peserta. Kali ini, Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan yang akan mewakili Indonesia."Ini akan dibuka oleh Presiden Xi Jinping. Dan Indonesia akan didampingi oleh Menko Maritim. Dan Pak Mendag juga akan ikut," kata Direktur Jenderal Pengembangan Ekspor Nasional (PEN) Kemendag, Dody Edward di kantor Kemendag, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Lantas, mengapa Luhut menjadi perwakilan RI sementara Kemendag sendiri berada di bawah koordinasi Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian?Menjawab hal itu, Dody mengatakan, Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) lah yang menunjuk langsung Luhut menjadi perwakilan RI."Undangannya adalah diminta Bapak Presiden Jokowi untuk hadir, lalu Pak Presiden langsung menunjuk Pak Menko Maritim," terang Dody.Selain itu, Dody mengatakan, Luhut merupakan utusan khusus Indonesia untuk hubungan bilateral baik terkait perdagangan dengan China. "Sebetulnya Bapak Menko Maritim karena kapasitas beliau sebagai special envoy. Utusan khusus Indonesia untuk China," tutupnya. Luhut Leads A Group of Indonesian Exporters to Participate in Trade Shows in China
01 Nov 2019, 12:15 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Andhika Prasetia / detikcom

Jakarta - Indonesia will participate in a trade exhibition in China, namely the China International Import Expo (CIIE) on 5-10 November 2019, in the city of Shanghai. In the trade exhibition, 172 countries participated in selling their products. The Ministry of Trade hooked 17 companies to participate in this trade show. Then, there are also 9 companies that have independently registered themselves to present at CIIE 2019. This international trade event also invited attaches from participating countries. This time, the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan will represent Indonesia. "This will be opened by President Xi Jinping. And Indonesia will be accompanied by the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and the Minister of Trade will also participate," said the Director General of National Export Development (PEN ) The Ministry of Trade, Dody Edward at the Ministry of Trade office, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). Then, why did Luhut become RI's representative while the Ministry of Trade itself was under the coordination of the Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs? Answering that, Dody said, President Joko Widodo ( Jokowi) was the one who directly appointed Luhut to be the Republic of Indonesia's representative. "The invitation was requested by Mr. President Jokowi to attend, then the President immediately appointed Mr. Maritime Coordinating Minister," explained Dody. In addition, Dody said, Luhut was a special Indonesian envoy for bilateral relations both related trade with China. "Actually, Mr. Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs because of his capacity as a special envoy. Indonesian special envoy for China," he concluded.
